activities: Any Personal Information sent may be used by Fox News Network, LLC for the following purposes: personnel administration (including hiring, promotion, succession planning, talent identification, discipline and termination proceedings, training and career development, and internal investigations); payroll, compensation and incentive decisions; benefits and other human resources administration; public relations and award programs; computer systems access and security; to satisfy legal and regulatory requirements; staffing; safety, occupational health and medical records administration; communications; in connection with corporate initiatives; compliance with legal obligations; travel bookings and expense reimbursement; mergers, acquisitions and divestitures; employee collaboration; and ensuring the proper functioning of the employee database.
recoursemech: To ensure compliance with the Safe Harbor Principles, the Organization will commit to cooperate with those Data Protection Authorities ("DPAs") of EU Member States or Switzerland (the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner) with jurisdiction in the investigation and resolution of complaints, and comply with appropriate advice given by those DPAs.
